lines.text: Let us be humbly thankful to Providence, for leading us from the turbulent waters of despair, into this land of promise.
We've got to watch the Mesquiteers, Williams.
Don't worry. Those suckers think you're Santy Claus.

[uncomfortable with Jimmy's rifle]
You want to be careful, Jimmy. Guns weren't made for youngsters to play with.
I never would gave thought of you as a heartthrob, Stony. Tuscon looks more the type.
Yes, he's so... tall and handsome...
Yes, but he's getting very conceited lately. You see, we just taught him to read and write.

[plotting]
This time we'll do the thing right.
